document.full_text: critics skewered james franco for a poor job co-hosting the oscars with some saying he looked stoned onstage, but on thursday, the actor said it was likely low energy, not dope, that was to blame.
document.title: franco blames poor oscar job on low energy
lines_and_colors: critics skewered james franco for a poor job co-hosting the oscars with some saying he looked stoned onstage, but on thursday, the actor said it was likely low energy, not dope, that was to blame.
